divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a stationary sliver of light about a half inch in size from the ground. I don't think it's the moon. It is cloudy out right now so I suppose it could also be a refraction of light from a star. Not sure, just thought I'd pass it off.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around August 2nd 2011
Summary: Sliver of light on cloudy night.
